Did you mean an assault rifle? If not a flame thrower would count....

 
 Ha! Where the hell are you going to get a flame thrower?
JediMindTricks

An assault rifle is a fully automatic (select fire) weapon used mostly by military. What civilians are allowed to have is semi-auto only clones of the real military guns. The "assault" is the action of weapon going fully automatic. This is way it's known as "select fire". You can engage the safety, semi auto only, or full auto. Assault rifles aren't classified by aesthetics although many an "anti" use terms like "evil black rifle", etc. The same could be said about a person, "no,no no, but wait that's different....emoticon_rolleyes "
JediMindTricks

potentially armour-piercing, possibly explosive.

 
 Only ammunition can be armor piercing, explosive, sub-sonic etc. Not guns.

sinjin

An assault rifle is a fully automatic (select fire) weapon used mostly by military. What civilians are allowed to have is semi-auto only clones of the real military guns. The "assault" is the action of weapon going fully automatic. This is way it's known as "select fire". You can engage the safety, semi auto only, or full auto. Assault rifles aren't classified by aesthetics although many an "anti" use terms like "evil black rifle", etc. The same could be said about a person, "no,no no, but wait that's different....emoticon_rolleyes "
But the recently expired ban did classify them based on magazine capacity regardless of being semi-auto.
JediMindTricks

But the recently expired ban did classify them based on magazine capacity regardless of being semi-auto.

 
 Yeah I know.... That was "their" classification though. Oligarchs don't like to fight fair....
Omegamon_X

But the recently expired ban did classify them based on magazine capacity regardless of being semi-auto.

 
 Wrong again. The now defunct ban classified any firearm with certain features as an "assault weapon" and banned magazines with a capacity over 10 rounds. However it doesn't pull some Washington DC bulls**t trick and say that any firearm that can fire more than 10 rounds without reloading automatically qualified as an "assault weapon". If this were the case then a large number of lever-action rifles would've been classified as "assault weapons" as well.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  What exactly a Assault Weapon???
